name: Fruit Scoop Berry Farm Master!
description:
You want to scoop up with fruit basket?
You just put the basket down from the tree.
You will find many magic fruit such as apples, cherries, orange, papaya, kiwi, banana, mango, pineapple, watermelon.
In this game you have to collect as many fruits.
Fruit to turn into money, and you can put money into upgrading the length of the rope and the capacity of the basket. new game 2019
Have fun with the Fruit Scoop game.
